titleStmt.title: Rihgt [sic] thoughts, the righteous mans evidence a discourse proving our state (God-ward) to be as our thoughts are, directing how to try them and our selves by them, propounding schemes of right thoughts, with motives and rules for keeping thoughts right : in two parts / by Faithful Teat.
titleStmt.author: Teate, Faithful, b. 1621.

notesStmt.note: Some pages are faded and have print show-through. Pages 137-139, 156, 165, 173, and 200 are stained with loss of print. Pages 130-209 photographed from British Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
